scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../blogilistafrontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../blogilista/build
scripts.build:ui:windows: if exist build rmdir /s /q build && cd ../blogilistafrontend && npm run build && xcopy /s /i dist ..\blogilista\build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui:windows && npm run start
scripts.deploy:full: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:ui:windows && npm run start
